name: code_and_document_learning_integration
description: Allows AI to learn from and improve its capabilities by analyzing the code files and documents provided.

file_paths.description: Paths to the code files or documents that should be analyzed and learned from.

learning_goals.description: Specific goals or areas of focus for learning (e.g., syntax improvement, domain-specific knowledge, documentation generation).

feedback_enabled.description: Whether the AI should provide feedback on what it has learned and suggest improvements based on the analysis.
